703912f-a.title: Brooklyn: Crown Street - Nostrand Avenue
703912f-a.text:
Crown Street, north side, from Nostrand Ave., on the east,to Rogers
Ave., on the west, and President Street on the north. This was the Kings
County Penitentiary. This site was purchased in 1846. On March 23, 1843
the Penitentiary and workhouse were completed. The hospital was completed
in 1849. It was demolished in 1907.
1905.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
NN6 ~ 3E78
703912f-a.folder: Crown Street & Nostrand Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
